title: Rights of purchaser
context: ยง490:8-302 Rights of purchaser. (a) Except as otherwise provided in subsections (b) and &copy;, a purchaser of a certificated or uncertificated security acquires all rights in the security that the transferor had or had power to transfer. (b) A purchaser of a limited interest acquires rights only to the extent of the interest purchased. &copy; A purchaser of a certificated security who as a previous holder had notice of an adverse claim does not improve its position by taking from a protected purchaser.
